key.name: amqpconnection
key.description: The traversal path (from the Zope root) to an executable Zope method (Python Script, external method, product method, etc). The method must take no arguments. Ex: "/site/methodname"

key.name: password
key.description: The password for the zope username provided above. Careful: this is obviously not encrypted in the config file. Ex: "123"

key.name: host
key.description: The hostname passed in via the "Host:" header in the faux request. Could be useful if you have virtual host rules set up inside Zope itself. Ex: "www.example.com"

key.name: sitePath
key.description: The site path to your application (having a sitemanager)
